original_text: But Moses said to the Lord, “Since I speak with faltering lips, why would Pharaoh listen to me?”
korean_text: 모세가 여호와 앞에서 아뢰되 나는 입이 둔한 자이오니 바로가 어찌 나의 말을 들으리이까

sentences.original_text: But Moses said to the Lord
Since I speak with faltering lips
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 말을 더듬는 입술로 말하기 때문에

sentences.original_text: why would Pharaoh listen to me?
